code:
%% UI Sitemap for Stock-Zen
%% Nodes reflect pages and main components discovered in `src/pages` and `src/components`

flowchart TD
  subgraph Public
    Home[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    Products[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    ProductDetail[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    Login[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    Register[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    NotFound[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    Support[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
  end

  subgraph User
    UserDashboard[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    Profile[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    MyProducts[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    Notifications[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    BookedProducts[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    Stats[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
  end

  subgraph Seller
    AddProduct[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    EditProduct[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    UploadImages[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
  end

  subgraph Admin
    AdminDashboard[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    ProductManage[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    UserManage[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    AdminNotifications[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
  end

  Home --> Products
  Products --> ProductDetail
  ProductDetail --> BookedProducts
  ProductDetail --> AddProduct
  Login --> UserDashboard
  Register --> Login
  UserDashboard --> Profile
  UserDashboard --> MyProducts
  UserDashboard --> Notifications
  MyProducts --> BookedProducts
  AdminDashboard --> ProductManage
  AdminDashboard --> UserManage
  AdminDashboard --> AdminNotifications

  %% notes
  classDef pages fill:#f4f6f8,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
  class Home,Products,ProductDetail,Login,Register,NotFound,Support,UserDashboard,Profile,MyProducts,Notifications,BookedProducts,Stats,AddProduct,EditProduct,UploadImages,AdminDashboard,ProductManage,UserManage,AdminNotifications pages;
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
